question: In which one of the following reactions, rate constant has the unit mol <katex>$L^{-1}s^{-1}$</katex>.
choices: Decomposition of HI on the surface of Gold
explanation: The unit **mol L<katex>$^{-1}$</katex> s<katex>$^{-1}$</katex>** corresponds to a **Zero Order** reaction.
The decomposition of HI on the surface of Gold is a classic example of a zero-order reaction (surface catalysis at high pressure).
